storyInfo: While Rhodes Island and the L.G.D. systematically eliminate the remnants of Reunion, the Yeti Squad members give up their lives to protect FrostNova from the powerful black raincoats.

attributes.content: All of the Reunion teams I could reach have pulled out.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: That's a lot of people.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: It's incredible... like a river.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: It'll be a river out there in the wilderness... a river of refugees.
attributes.name: Nesti

attributes.content: There's Ursus and Lugmenites out there. Infected and ordinary folk alike. No matter what they came with, they're leaving empty-handed.
attributes.name: Nesti

attributes.content: They thought there was a place that would take them. Now they know there's never anywhere they could've gone.
attributes.name: Nesti

attributes.content: This river won't flow forever.
attributes.name: Nesti

attributes.content: (He sounds so sad.)
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: (He picked that up from Big Daddy.)
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: (No wonder. Anyone would get sentimental at a time like this.)
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: If Big Daddy was here, we would've won the fight and it wouldn't have come to this, huh?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: It's the luck of the draw. No use thinking about how things could've been.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: ......Get ready. I'll go talk it over with the Phantom Crossbowmen.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Don't rush me. It's not like I don't know.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Hurry up already. Quit screwing around.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: I'm pretty choked up too!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's Yeti Squad.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What about Amiya and her people?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: They're already on their way. Amiya said to tell you to 'take it easy'.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: She knows better than to tell me that. It's me, Blaze. When do I ever take it easy?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze! Where are you going?!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: To save lives!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Crossbowmen! Wait up!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Yetis... what are you doing?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: It's Sister FrostNova... She's growing weak. She can't keep this up for long.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: She exhausted her energy pushing back Lungmen's forces. She may not wake up for a while.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: You mean you want us to take her with us?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: But we aren't going back to Chernobog. Faust didn't want Mephisto to go back...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: We're begging you!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: We want Sister to be together with Patriot, in the end!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: We know, they're not exactly getting along right now, but... their bond is stronger than blood.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: So please... we beg of you.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: And what will you do?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: We'll cover you. If we don't hold them back, the Lungmenites will catch you in no time.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Once you're all far enough away from Lungmen that you're no longer a threat to them, they'll give up the chase.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: But that means, you guys will...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Live by the sword, die by the sword. We're okay with dying in battle.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: The future that Sister FrostNova spoke of is still a ways away. But we don't need to see it for ourselves.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: We owe you our lives.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: That's nothing. You're saving our Sister.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: ...We will do what you ask of us. I swear it.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Take these armguards. And put on this protective suit.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: What for?
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Our Sister is far too cold for you.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: ...She's so light...
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: The Arts have emptied her body. Easy now, easy...
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Don't wake her.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Look at her... look how softly she sleeps.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Goodbye, Sister...
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: We'll be waiting for you.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: ...All right then.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Let's... move on.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: It's us that's moving on.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: We'll meet again, Yetis.
attributes.name: Phantom Crossbowman

attributes.content: Not too soon, I hope.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Are we going to die?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: *Ursine profanity*, what are you crying for?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Are you a Yeti or not?!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Are you not crying?!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: What am I crying about...?! Did you forget what Sister said?!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: She said not to cry.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Right! She said not to cry... More than a decade ago, she said not to cry! So I don't want to see any tears! We don't get to cry... because we haven't won yet!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Once we win, once we're free...
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: Once we're free, we'll cry our eyes out, in the wilderness, in the snow, in the stacks of wheat piled high, we'll be bawling!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Sister was crying as she said it, you know.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: She was only nine at the time. We were all a little older than her...
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Without her, we would have died in that mine.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Did you bring the sauce?
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Bring the what...? Wait, I thought we weren't allowed to bring it?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: You're not allowed to drink on the march, but you had it with you, I know.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: I want a drink too...
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: You're not old enough yet, are you?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: B- but I've never tried before. I don't want to die without ever tasting it...
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: Give him a little.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Petrova...
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Fine, take a swig. But not too much, we all need a share.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Na zdorovye, brothers! Warm up!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: To Sister! And Big Daddy!
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: To FrostNova! And Patriot!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad All Together

attributes.content: Do you know these Infected?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I do, Officer Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But this final battle must be fought.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Do we have a choice?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We may not.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Look behind you. They're not even trying to hide themselves anymore.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...The black raincoats.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So, we have to fight them.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This is what we must do. If we don't, we'll fall short. And the business of pushing the special forces into the Yetis becomes pretty unconvincing.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Unless you could convince them to surrender?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: As long as there's Infected behind them... they won't give up.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Amiya.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I won't force you to fight.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Officer Ch'en. But... but we will witness it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The L. G. D. fought bravely, no one can deny that. You fought for Lungmen, against the invaders.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is how we will help you against those special forces.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And for our sake... We must record every battle for the Infected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Every single one.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When this battle is over, let's grab a bite together.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: B- but I'm Infected...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't care. The loudmouth and the tall lady? They won't mind either.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This battle... it's going to cost a lot.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: For us, it's a battle.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: For Lungmen, it's a war.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And that's what war is.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But whoever it was who planned all this, they're not here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Say, there's something I have to tell you——
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ——But not right now.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yeah. Not right now, Officer Ch'en.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor......
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Mhm.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: But just like in the ruins of Chernobog...

attributes.content: You're right. I decided.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I need to see it... with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Together.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So we don't call her Big Sister because she's older than us...? Why am I just learning this now?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: Well, it works for you. You were three years old back then.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Pfft!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: Hey, what's with the attitude? Did you get drunk off two sips? When you cried out for food, did I feed you or not?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: That was then, this is... now!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: You know, it's funny. I'm suddenly thinking about those Rhodes Islanders.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: That one cat, with the hot body, the one who said she wanted to drink with us.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: It's too bad. She looked like she'd be able to hold her liquor. She looked like a real good time.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: But the little rabbit, she can't be old enough yet?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: What is she? 16? 17?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: More like 14. She just seems older because she talks fancy.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: As old as Sister was... back then.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: Let's toast them one more time.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: So it is said, so shall it be done!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member A

attributes.content: So shall it be done!
attributes.name: Nesti

attributes.content: Um, uh... so shall it be done!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member D

attributes.content: Lungmenites should be more coordinated.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Get out of here. The Yetis can only hold them for a while.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: You don't think what they're doing is incredible?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: If we die, then they did it all for nothing.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: The Phantom Crossbowmen say we can't go back to Chernobog. So we're going to a new place.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: You don't care where our new base is?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Wherever it is, I'm going with you.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Heh. You Lungmenites are no different from us.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: I was hoping they'd treat you better here. Turns out it's the same as it was in Ursus.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Infected suffer the same everywhere.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: That's not what you said when you first got here.
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: People change.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Yetis? Are those the Yetis?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's the Yetis! R- right...? Definitely!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Yetiiiis... Yetiiii! Why are you Yetis like this?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Damn it! Don't die! I won't let you die!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Just hold on, I can save you! I'll get you to safety...!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why do you Infected want to die here?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The special forces stopped attacking? No, looks like they're pulling back...?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Seems... they're giving us the initiative.
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Are we showing the power of Lungmen's law enforcement? *Lungmen profanity* They underestimated us!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: ...Never mind.
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Listen up, this is the last wave! Don't disappoint the people, or Ch'en Sir.
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: We'll show Reunion how powerful Lungmen is! The Infected won't dare attack our city again!
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Hah...
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Phantom Crossbowmen, don't let us down. You have to get our Sister back to the old man.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: ...She's running out of time. She should spend it with him.
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: We don't have much time left ourselves, eh?
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Ready?
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Ready. Let's give back our lives.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: Let's show them what the squad trained by Buldrokkas'tee, Ursus's greatest soldier, and led by it's coldest nightmare, can do!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member B

attributes.content: The last of Sister's Originium Arts...
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Frost Originium, ready to loose!
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Nesti! We're coming!
attributes.name: Petrova

attributes.content: Yetiiiiiiiiiis!!!
attributes.name: Blaze
